Unauthenticated.title: Unauthenticated request
Unauthenticated.detail: Your request did not contain any authentication information. Refer to the API document for valid authentication schemes.

Unauthorized.title: Unauthorized request
Unauthorized.detail: Your request contained valid authentication details but you do not have the correct level of access to carry out this operation.

Not Found.title: Not found
Not Found.detail: The resource could not be found.
